addMultipleTagToMultipleAccounts(address.details: Add a general tag to an account at index in array. Restricted to Application Administrators. Loops through existing tags on accounts and will emit  an event if tag is already applied.

params._tags: Tag array for the account at index. Can be any allowed string variant

addTag(address,bytes32).details: Add the tag. Restricted to owner.

addTagToMultipleAccounts(address[],bytes.details: Add a general tag to an account. Restricted to Application Administrators. Loops through existing tags on accounts and will emit an event if tag is * already applied.

params._tag: Tag for the account. Can be any allowed string variant

confirmDataProvider(uint8).details: Part of the two step process to set a new Data Provider within a Protocol AppManager

confirmOwner().details: This function confirms a new appManagerAddress that was put in storage. It can only be confirmed by the proposed address

getAllTags(address).details: Get all the tags for the address

hasTag(address,bytes32).details: Check is a user has a certain tag

returns._0: hasTag true if it has the tag, false if it doesn't

proposeOwner(address).details: This function proposes a new owner that is put in storage to be confirmed in a separate process

removeTag(address,bytes32).details: Remove the tag. Restricted to owner.

addMultipleTagToMultipleAccounts(address.notice: there is a hard limit of 10 tags per address.

addTagToMultipleAccounts(address[],bytes.notice: there is a hard limit of 10 tags per address. This limit is also enforced by the protocol, so keeping this limit here prevents transfers to unexpectedly revert
